name: HotDocs Library File
summary: Learn about .HDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HotDocs libraries are saved to the following directory:\​My Documents\​HotDocs\​Libraries\​.
Templates referenced by HDL files are stored in the following directory:\​My Documents\​HotDocs\​Templates\​.

description: File created by HotDocs digital form preparation software; saved in an XML format and contains references to resources used by the program; may reference text templates (.WPT, .DOT, or .RTF files) called "clauses," user answers (.ANX files), or even external Web URLs; also contains a description for each referenced resource.
